title: AI Virtual Try-On
summary: An AI-powered platform designed for e-commerce to transform flat-lay clothing photos into professional on-model images, eliminating the need for physical photoshoots.
description:
Built with the latest web technologies including *Next.js 16*, *React 19*, and *Tailwind CSS 4*, this application revolutionizes how online sellers present their inventory. Users can upload simple ghost mannequin or flat-lay photos and instantly generate high-quality, realistic model images using *advanced generative AI*. The platform features a robust credit-based system integrated with *Stripe* for secure payments, allowing users to choose between different AI configurations ranging from basic to ultra-premium quality. 
Beyond standard try-on capabilities, the "*Studio Generation*" feature offers e-commerce ready front and back views with perfect lighting and shadows. The application ensures a seamless user experience with *Supabase authentication*, *cloud-native image processing*, and a responsive, localized interface available in *multiple languages*. It addresses the privacy and logistical challenges of modeling clothes, making professional product photography accessible to everyone.

features.AI Virtual Try-On: Instantly dresses AI-generated models in user-uploaded garments using Google Vertex AI (Imagen 3 & 4).
features.Studio Quality Generation: Produces professional front and back product shots from imperfect input images.
features.Modern Tech Stack: Developed with Next.js 16, React 19, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS 4 for peak performance.
features.Credit System & Payments: Integrated Stripe payments with a tiered credit consumption model for different AI quality levels.
features.Authentication & Security: Secure user management and data protection powered by Supabase.
features.Internationalization: Fully localized interface supporting English and Hungarian via `next-intl`.
features.Cloud Infrastructure: Scalable serverless architecture utilizing Google Cloud Platform for heavy AI workloads.

title: Car Rental Management System
summary: A full-stack Car Rental Management System designed to streamline vehicle leasing operations.
description:
This comprehensive Car Rental Management System offers a modern digital solution for vehicle rental businesses. At its core, the application features a powerful *Spring Boot* backend that handles complex business logic and data persistence via *MySQL*, ensuring data integrity and fast response times. 
The frontend, developed with *React* and *Vite*, provides a responsive and interactive user experience enhanced by *TailwindCSS* and *Material UI*. The system is designed with scalability in mind, utilizing RESTful APIs to facilitate secure and efficient communication between client and server.

features.Fleet Management: Complete CRUD operations for managing vehicle inventory, including specifications and availability status.
features.User Administration: Secure user authentication and profile management for both administrators and customers.
features.Loan Processing: Streamlined workflow for processing vehicle loans, tracking rentals, and managing returns.
features.Modern UI/UX: Responsive interface built with React, styled with TailwindCSS and MUI, and enhanced with GSAP animations.
features.Data Persistence: Robust MySQL database integration using Hibernate ORM for reliable data storage and retrieval.
features.RESTful Architecture: Scalable API design ensuring efficient data exchange between the client and server.
